definitions: Bend one's head or body forward and downward.
Lower one's moral standards; condescend to an action that is considered undignified.
Have the head and shoulders habitually bent forward.
Descend from the air to attack prey (of a bird of prey).
examples: He had to stoop to enter the low doorway.
I would never stoop to cheating.
She tends to stoop when she walks.
The hawk will stoop on its prey.
